Topic outline:
View slides in new window

Exercises

Install R and RStudio on your computer.
Download the entire folder 01-getting-started-r from the Google Drive link. For the meantime, keep the folder in your computer and wait for further instructions during the class.
Before the training will start, open the RStudio and paste the following code in the console to install the required packages. Just click the clipboard icon to copy the code.


## install required packages
install.packages(c("janitor", "readxl", "haven", "tidyverse", "skimr"))
